allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: adjust build path in workflow

Change from common/pmi_rust_backend to common for build steps

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
perf: optimize Windows build with additional LLVM args

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: adjust module output path in workflow

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: remove --no-rosegment option for musl builds

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
refactor: switch update_dep workflow to claude_proxy_rs repo

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
